concent: Consent to receive news and special promotions through all channels from Fastwork.
cookie_use: Fastwork uses cookies to help improve and enhance your user experience when you visit our website. You can choose to consent to each type of cookie (except for essential cookies).
analytics_cookies_description: Allow Fastwork to collect usage data for analysis to improve platform performance.
functional_cookies_description: Fastwork must use these cookies to allow you to access pages and store session details for efficient browsing. These cookies do not store identifiable user data.
mandatory_cookies: These cookies are required for site functionality and cannot be disabled.
marketing_cookies_description: Allow Fastwork to collect advertising data to provide relevant suggestions.
newsletter_promotions: Receive news, discounts, and promotions from Fastwork
terms_conditions: Read the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
